alert.note: Alert for Val Verde (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 27 at 10:12PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Val Verde County through 1100 PM CDT... At 1012 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Cienegas Terrace, or 8 miles south of Del Rio, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Del Rio, Comstock, Lake View, Amistad Acres, Laughlin AFB, Cienegas Terrace, Amistad Village, Black Brush Point, Seminole Canyon State Park, Box Canyon, Val Verde Park, Diablo East, Governors Landing, Long Point, Pecos River Boat Ramp, 277 South Boat Ramp, 277 North Campground, Rough Canyon Recreation Area, Spur 406 Campground, and Rock Quarry Campground. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
